resources.string: Tap the screen when you\'re ready
Complete the task from the players\nTap the screen when you\'re ready
Tap the word to change its result
Tap the team to change its name
Author\'s game for companies from four people.

\tPlayers are divided into several teams from two people. Then the deck size is chosen.\n\tThe one must explain as much words as possible to one\'s team using the specified explanation way within the chosen time. Next team\'s deck consists of all the words except the guessed in current mode ones.\n\Once the cards run out, the main deck is shuffled and the same cards are explained in a new way:
\tTell stories, give examples, remember songs and come up with clues, but don\'t explain letters, don\'t use cognate (for example take - undertaking) and foreign words.\n\tSimilar game is Alias.
\tMove any part of you body, take any poses you want, draw in the air with gestures, but don\'t make any sound, don\'t point to objects and don\'t show the letters.\n\tSimilar game is Crocodile.

\tYou can say only one word as far as the players have learned all the cards in a deck in the two previous rounds. Be careful: you can\'t change the chosen word with any other way except of swiping the card down. Don\'t forget about the rule for cognate and foreign words.

\tThe team scored the most points during all the rounds wins.\n\tPlayers can turn on the mode of the common last word: once the time runs out, the word can be guessed by any team.\n\Task from players can be anything from truth or dare to crowing under the table.
Turn the sound on in the game settings or increase your device volume to let all the teams follow the progress of the game
